modName: Conjure Clifford the Big Red Dog
summary:
This is my first uploaded mod. This mod focuses on the Clifford the Big Red Dog.
All it does is adding a new conjuration spell which summons the Red Dog.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]

All it does is [u]adding a new conjuration[/u] spell which summons the Big Red Dog, a [url=https://youtu.be/8O9n-g9gRNk]super friendly dog[/url].[/size]
[size=4][img]https://i.imgur.com/gir1YGC.png[/img]
[/size][size=5][img]http://i.imgur.com/MqnzoP4.png[/img][/size]
[b][i] ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿[size=5] ﻿FAQ
[/size][/i][/b]
[list]
[*][b][size=3]Does it speak?[/size][/b]
[b][size=3]
[/size][/b][size=3]  No. If anyone is willing to voice-act and create some dialogue, i'm in!



[/size][*][b][size=3]What can it do?[/size][/b]
[b][size=3]
[/size][/b][size=3]  So far It can only bark, attack, it can do anything a normal dog would do



[/size][*][b][size=3]How big is it?[/size][/b]
[b][size=3]
[/size][/b][size=3]  It's about the same size as a mammoth



[/size][*][size=3][b]Is it [/b][b]compatible with...?[/b][/size]
[size=3][b]
[/b][/size][size=3]  Sure, if not let me know[/size][/list]


[size=4]NOTE: If you have any suggestions on how to make this mod better, or have any ridiculous mod-ideas, leave a comment and let me know.[/size]
author: Walamo15
